title: warranty google pixel 3a in poland . Where I must go ? In ctdi site I see I must contact google
content: i have problem with digitizer in google pixel 3a . I live in poland and is big problem with warranty service . On ctdi site I see if I want to send phone to they service center I must first contact with google center. What can I do it ? What is email or something ? I look for this few hours and nothing. Please help me.
